posts.post_content: I think this is good enough to see some fringe play in wrath heavy control decks. Note that if you have more than one in play, you can activate each plate's ability in response to the other, so you're cheating your way into having more than one attacking equipment out there. Also, very good design. 4.5/5

Posted By: Pigfish99 (7/9/2013 5:53:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I play Modern Format only. I rate and review cards based on their usefulness in that format. I may also be wrong about cards so take my comments with that context in mind!  
  
I loved this card when it came out... But quickly realized that it takes 8 mana to get this thing out... In modern format, that is a very high casting cost... Compare that to any of the swords at 5cmc or something like [Runechanter's Pike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runechanter's Pike) at 4cmc to play/equip...   
  
I believe that this card will do best in a deck that is loaded with mass removal... possibly with reanimation.  
  
I would have rated this higher but the cmc was too much for me...
posts.html:

I believe that this card will do best in a deck that is loaded with mass removal... possibly with reanimation.

I would have rated this higher but the cmc was too much for me...
